entry.title: SRTM 1arc second DEM global available
entry.content:
Global SRTM 30m resolution DEM are available free now through USGS DATA portal (http://earthexplorer.usgs.gov), which is earlier than expect. There are some places not covered this time. The guy had tested the quality of this dataset quickly. The result seem to be good.

If you want to download the SRTM1 easily and quickly, you can go here and use wget tool to download. The data format is .hgt. Some guy said

“The 1 sec SRTM for the world (srtmgl1) are not all processed”

so if you want to get more quality, you should wait for sometime
